metadata.name: MiriestrixArt Open Edition #01
metadata.description:
MiriestrixArt: Through the Soul of a Butterfly!  
 
Hello, my name is Miriestrix, Miri for short – my kids & I reside in Germany!  
Thanks for minting MiriestrixArt Open Edition #01 NFT – I appreciate your support! 
My Art Style is experimental, colorful, abstract, explorative, fun, wild & free - just like me! These days, I am obsessed with Acrylic Pouring, Mixed-Media, Digital ART & NFTs, but thanks to my various dis’eases & dis’orders, my creative journey knows no limitations! I do what I love & love what I do, following my intuition as I design in flow with my life’s energy…  
For me, the art process has always had meditative & therapeutic benefits. What a great outlet to free & reprogram your mind from false beliefs - reducing both stress & anxiety.  
If you happen to struggle in life, looking for a Roadmap to rethink your STATUS QUO in all areas of life, please consider this your invitation to join our LifeArtists Discord Family, where we HEAL-INVEST & EVOLVE alongside each other. 
Feel free to showcase your creations on our art channel…  
Together, we paint the most beautiful Masterpiece!  
Express & stay true to yourself!

From Miriestrix with Love

https://miriestrix.lpages.co/miriestrixart/
